PackagesOverview.Title: Plugins
PackagesOverview.Description:
Plugins are additional modules/extensions you can easily add to an existing webshop. Since a plugin can include both client-side code as well as do back-end processing they often offer more comprehensive functionality than widgets.


Plugins are typically developed by individuals or webshops that need the functionality and later made the code available for others. Please understand that listing them on this page is for your convenience. Using a plugin is at your own risk and with no support from Bring. We encourage you to contribute your improvements to the community.
